item.title: Primal Kite & new fire cape
item.dc:creator: @haz3y haz3y
item.description:
@haz3y wrote:

can someone give me model and ints

case 13744:
			itemDef.actions = new String[5];
			itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield";
			itemDef.modelID = 40920;
			itemDef.modelZoom = 1616;
			itemDef.modelRotation1 = 396;
			itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1050;
			itemDef.modelOffset1 = -3;
			itemDef.modelOffset2 = 4;
			itemDef.maleEquip1 = 40940;
			itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 40940;
			itemDef.anInt188 = -1;
			itemDef.anInt164 = -1;
			itemDef.aByte154 = -10;
			itemDef.aByte205 = -10;
			itemDef.name = "Spectral spirit shield";
			itemDef.description = "It's a Spectral spirit shield.".getBytes();
                           break;

ints in that format
